name: sticky_note
description: Take notes in a rich text editor, [website](https://www.stickynote.app).

scripts.install-all: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run install-client && npm run build
scripts.start: cd server && npm install && node src/server.js
scripts.start-local: npm run install-all && cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run watch
